35 template <class T>
36 class PL_DLL_API plCndLearnObject : public plLearnDistributionTable
37 {
38  public:
39 
41  plCndLearnObject()
42  : plLearnDistributionTable()
43  {}
44 
52  plCndLearnObject(const plVariablesConjunction &left_vars,
53  const plVariablesConjunction &right_vars,
54  const T &init_object=T())
55  : plLearnDistributionTable(left_vars, right_vars,
56  init_object.get_left_variables().is_empty() ?
57  T(typename T::VarType(left_vars)) : init_object,
58  init_object.get_left_variables().is_empty())
59  {}

65  const T* get_learnt_object_for_value(const plValues &right_value)const
66  {
67  return
68  static_cast<const T*>(plLearnDistributionTable::get_learnt_object_for_value(right_value));
69  }
70

72  {
73  return new plCndLearnObject<T>(*this);
74  }
